title: SkillMimic: Concept

definitions.SkillMimic: A concept that involves capturing real-world skills and simulating them in a virtual environment for unified learning.

formulas: Real-World Skill -> HOI Motion Data -> Skill in Simulator
summary: SkillMimic is a concept that captures real-world skills, processes them into HOI motion data, and simulates them in a virtual environment for unified learning of all basketball skills.
